contract_title: Core Module Consolidation & SOLID Implementation Mission

contract_details.description: Critical core architecture consolidation focusing on SOLID principles implementation, module consolidation, and architectural stability. Eliminate duplication while maintaining system integrity.
contract_details.background: Agent-6 specializes in SOLID principles and architectural excellence. This contract addresses the highest priority consolidation tasks in the core modules.
objectives: Consolidate 15+ core service files into unified architecture
Eliminate architectural duplication across core modules
Implement SOLID principles across all core components
Create unified core interfaces and abstractions
Reduce core complexity from 13+ modules to <5 consolidated units
Establish architectural patterns for future development
Document core architectural decisions and dependencies
Validate architectural stability through comprehensive testing
deliverables: Consolidated core architecture with reduced complexity
SOLID principles implementation across core modules
Unified core interfaces and service abstractions
Core module dependency mapping and analysis
Comprehensive test suite for consolidated architecture
Performance validation of consolidated core systems
technical_requirements: SOLID principles expertise and implementation tools
Architectural analysis and design pattern tools
Performance profiling tools for core systems
success_criteria: Core complexity reduced from 13+ to <5 consolidated modules
Zero architectural regressions or breaking changes
All core service files successfully consolidated

dependencies: Task inventory created with 358 consolidation opportunities

contract_history.details: Created core architecture consolidation contract for Agent-6 (PHASE 1 Batch 1A)
